definition: of or in a condition of social order
details:
adjective
- of or in a condition of social order
= example: of or in a condition of social order
- not rude
= synonyms: polite
- (of divisions of time) legally recognized in ordinary affairs of life
= example: (of divisions of time) legally recognized in ordinary affairs of life
- applying to ordinary citizens as contrasted with the military
= example: applying to ordinary citizens as contrasted with the military
- of or relating to or befitting citizens as individuals
= example: of or relating to or befitting citizens as individuals
= synonyms: civic
- of or occurring within the state or between or among citizens of the state
= example: of or occurring within the state or between or among citizens of the state
